entry.title: Monday: Rain at times heavy. High 10.
entry.summary: Rain at times heavy ending this afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of showers. Amount 15 to 25 mm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming southwest 20 near noon. High 10. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Monday 1 May 2023
